tasks.label: ROS2: Build (Debug)
args: cd '${workspaceFolder}/ros2_ws' && source ./scripts/source.sh jazzy && colcon build --symlink-install --packages-select ros2_learning_cpp ros2_learning_turtlebot3_teleop --cmake-force-configure --cmake-args -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON

tasks.label: ROS2: Build (RelWithDebInfo)
args: cd '${workspaceFolder}/ros2_ws' && source ./scripts/source.sh jazzy && colcon build --symlink-install --packages-select ros2_learning_cpp --cmake-force-configure --cmake-args -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON

tasks.label: ROS2: Run talker (integrated terminal)
args: cd '${workspaceFolder}/ros2_ws' && source ./scripts/source.sh jazzy && ros2 run ros2_learning_cpp talker

tasks.label: ROS2: Run listener (integrated terminal)
args: cd '${workspaceFolder}/ros2_ws' && source ./scripts/source.sh jazzy && ros2 run ros2_learning_cpp listener
